comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Steve-O, you're a mind reader. I was just looking at NW passage while walking up the hill this morning and thinking we're way overdue. Great call! DU

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Never seen so many people trying to kill us in one ride. Did someone put a contract out on us? Nice try, whoever you are, but you hired a bunch of nincompoops. DU
